CustomField.description: Define the reason this Account was changed to Former.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Define the reason this Account was changed to Former.
CustomField.label: Reason Lost

value.fullName: Customer lost bid or project was cancelled
value.label: Customer lost bid or project was cancelled

value.fullName: Product assortment did not meet customer needs
value.label: Product assortment did not meet customer needs

value.fullName: Price offered did not meet customer perception of value
value.label: Price offered did not meet customer perception of value

value.fullName: Credit solution did not meet customer needs
value.label: Credit solution did not meet customer needs

value.fullName: Contract terms did not meet customer needs
value.label: Contract terms did not meet customer needs

value.fullName: Service failure (e.g. delivery, billing, order management) caused the customer to purchase elsewhere
value.label: Service failure (e.g. delivery, billing, order management) caused the customer to purchase elsewhere
